text: The 2019 Pan American Table Tennis Championships were held in Asunción, Paraguay from 3 to 8 September 2019. ==Medal summary== ===Events=== {| |- |rowspan=2|Men's singles |rowspan=2| Vitor Ishiy |rowspan=2| Gastón Alto | Gustavo Tsuboi |- | Kanak Jha |- |rowspan=2|Women's singles |rowspan=2| Lily Zhang |rowspan=2| Bruna Takahashi | Zhang Mo |- | Jennifer Wu |- |rowspan=2|Men's doubles |rowspan=2| Gastón Alto Horacio Cifuentes |rowspan=2| Eric Jouti Gustavo Tsuboi | Gustavo Gómez Juan Lamadrid |- | Marcos Madrid Ricardo Villa |- |rowspan=2|Women's doubles |rowspan=2| Jennifer Wu Lily Zhang |rowspan=2| Daniela Ortega Paulina Vega | Xu Joyce Zhang Mo |- | Melanie Díaz Daniely Ríos |- |rowspan=2|Mixed doubles |rowspan=2| Kai Zhang Lily Zhang |rowspan=2| Nikhil Kumar Amy Wang | Horacio Cifuentes Camila Argüelles |- | Daniel González Melanie Díaz |- |rowspan=2|Men's team |rowspan=2| Gustavo Tsuboi Eric Jouti Vitor Ishiy Thiago Monteiro |rowspan=2| Brian Afanador Daniel González Ángel Naranjo | Jeremy Hazin Edward Ly Marko Medjugorac Terence Yeung |- | Kanak Jha Nikhil Kumar Kai Zhang Nicholas Tio |- |rowspan=2|Women's team |rowspan=2| Lily Zhang Jennifer Wu Crystal Wang Amy Wang |rowspan=2| Bruna Takahashi Jéssica Yamada Caroline Kumahara Bruna Alexandre | Paulina Vega Daniela Ortega Judith Morales Valentina Ríos |- | Adriana Díaz Melanie Díaz Daniely Ríos |} ===Medal table=== ==See also== *2019 ITTF Pan-America Cup ==References== Category:Pan American Table Tennis Championships Pan American Table Tennis Championships Pan American Table Tennis Championships Category:Sports competitions in Asunción Category:Table tennis competitions in Paraguay Category:International sports competitions hosted by Paraguay Pan American Table Tennis Championships
title: 2019 Pan American Table Tennis Championships
